review_title: Amazing employers with an even better ethos
pros: Genuinely care about staff , morally and ethically sound place of work. Friendly workplace that strives to develop and progress staff with a huge investment in their progress
cons: Generally offer 12 month contracts however they always fought to keep staff on longer . I worked there for 4 years on an initial 12 month contract

job_title: Social Worker/Case Manager in Calgary, AB
pros: Not Conducive, no support from management
cons: Good co workers, good pay and service
On call duties could conflict family life

job_title: Real Estate Salesperson in Auckland, Auckland
pros: The People, The Place, The Leadership
cons: There's nothing I can say bad about working here

job_title: Community Engagement Volunteer in Salford, North West England, England
pros: local company helping local people  great people that work there extremly helpful. very positive experience great volunteering opportunities
cons: none i throughly enjoyed my time volunteering at unlimited potential  meet some lovely people no cons for me

pros: None this place really sucks. Don't get lured in by the decent salary. It's not worth it. You will end up wasting your time and quitting like every one else. The ones who stay are deranged anyways
cons: Lousy staff, terrible management, worst place to ever work   Kids are psychopaths as are the management. Poor working conditions  Stay away
